title: Broccoli Cheese Soup with Chicken
ingredients: ['115g butter', '125g plain flour', '2.6 litres water', '3 cubes chicken stock', '900g skinless, chicken breast fillets, cut into bite-size pieces', '2 heads broccoli, cut into florets', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '250ml single cream', '350g Cheddar cheese, grated']
